title: G.D. Fabril (futsal)
text: Grupo Desportivo Fabril is a <a href="futsal">futsal</a> team based in the city of <a href="Barreiro%2C%20Portugal">Barreiro</a>, <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a>, that played in the <a href="Portuguese%20Futsal%20First%20Division">Portuguese Futsal First Division</a>. It is a part of the <a href="G.D.%20Fabril">G.D. Fabril</a> <a href="sports%20club">sports club</a>. In 2017 Fabril won the South Zone series of the Portuguese <a href="2016%E2%80%9317%20II%20Divis%C3%A3o%20Futsal">II Divisão Futsal</a> achieving the promotion to the first tier <a href="Liga%20Portuguesa%20de%20Futsal">Liga Sport Zone</a> for the second time in its history. In 2018 Fabril made it to the <a href="Ta%C3%A7a%20de%20Portugal%20de%20Futsal">Taça de Portugal</a> final eventually losing it to <a href="Sporting%20Clube%20de%20Portugal%20%28futsal%29">Sporting CP</a>.
